titleStmt.title: An Act appointing judges for the Admiralty
Public General Acts. 1659
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Field, printer to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Appointing John Godolphin and Charles George Cock to be judges of the admiralty until 10 December 1659.
Dated at end: Tuesday, July 19. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Tho. St Nicholas clerk of the Parliament.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.

place.placeName: the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church
